messages.subject: Christie's Museum Catalogue
messages.msgSnippet: I have copies of Christie s Tosogu Museum catalogue of 10th November 2004, it illustrates fine 69 blades together wirh prices and is for sale at GBP22 plus
messages.messageBody:
I have copies of Christie's Tosogu Museum catalogue of 10th November 2004, it illustrates fine 69 blades together wirh prices and is for sale at GBP22 plus airmail postage of GBP3.00 for Europe or GBP6.00 for the USA. Paypal acceptable.
Alan Bale
